attributes.action: To stop any new legislation with regard to Pay to Throw that is being proposed by the Local Government Association.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country has a law requiring councils to collect rubbish, the collection is paid for by the general public in the council tax, councils have failed in the removal of rubbish and its disposal and now expects the population to pay even more for this service, the only way possible to do this is by changing legislation, to allow them to escape their responsibilities to the tax payer, the government should not bow to this pressure and ensure councils abide by the law and remove rubbish as is required of them.
